channel.title: record label on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in record label on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Arista Records Logo Arista Records, Inc. is an American record label owned by Sony Music Entertainment, a subsidiary of Sony Corporation of America, the North American division of the Japanese conglomerate Sony. The label was previously handled by Bertelsmann Music Group. The label was founded in 1974 by Clive Davis. Along with Columbia Records, RCA Records and Epic Records, Arista is one of Sony Music’s four flagship record labels. Source
You can download theAristalogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Arista
item.description: Arista Records, Inc. is an American record label owned by Sony Music Entertainment, a subsidiary of Sony Corporation of America, the North American division of the Japanese conglomerate Sony. The label was previously handled by Bertelsmann Music Group. The label was founded in 1974 by Clive Davis. Along with Columbia Records, RCA Records and Epic Records, Arista is one of Sony Music’s four flagship record labels. Source
